name: Cirtus Blast
description:
YUM!!!

Our skin loving ingredients; Olive oil, organic coconut oil, sustainable palm oil, canola oil, organic shea butter, organic beeswax, sodium hydroxide, distilled water, fragrance oils, kaolin clay, castor oil, glycerin, mica, topped with body safe glitter

Because our soap is hand made, no two bars will be exactly the same.

Thank you for looking, and we hope you will try a bar. Your body will thank you.



Min. weight 5.0 oz

name: Ocean Breeze
description:
Ocean Breeze
 
Imagine the ocean spray gently touching your face. This is a clean calming scent everyone will enjoy.

Our skin loving ingredients; Olive oil, organic coconut oil, sustainable palm oil, canola oil, organic shea butter, sodium hydroxide, distilled water, fragrance oils, kaolin clay, castor oil, glycerin,vitamin E oil, mica, sugar, may be topped with body safe glitter

Because our soap is hand made, no two bars will be exactly the same.

Thank you for looking, and we hope you will try a bar. Your body will thank you.


Min. weight 5.5 oz

name: Hugs and kisses

name: Mackenzie's Mint
description:
This is a very refreshing unisex scent,. It is a blend of peppermint, spearmint, rosemary, basil and dark patchouli essential oils.

Our skin loving ingredients; Olive oil, organic coconut oil, sustainable palm oil, canola oil, soy oil, organic bees wax, organic shea butter, organic coconut cream, sodium hydroxide, distilled water, essential oils, kaolin clay, dioxides.

Because our soap is hand made, no two bars will be exactly the same.

Thank you for looking, and we hope you will try a bar. Your body will thank you.

Min. weight 4.5 oz

name: Honey B Mine
description:
Honey B Mine
 
This is a delicious cherry, almond and honey scented milk soap that the entire family will love.

Our skin loving ingredients; Olive oil, organic coconut oil, sustainable palm oil, canola oil, organic bees wax, organic shea butter, cream, sodium hydroxide, distilled water, fragrance oils, castor oil, organic honey, mica.

Because our soap is hand made, no two bars will be exactly the same.

Thank you for looking, and we hope you will try a bar. Your body will thank you.

Min. weight 5.5 oz
